title: Swiss-style sans-serif from a 1981 art exhibition poster
content:
Hi,  
I was wondering if anyone would be able to help me identify this beautiful Swiss-style sans-serif font from a 1981 art exhibition poster from the Museum für Gestaltung.  
Thank you !

Font: 

 Futura 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132435/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_mh6nxcq3cj1qzqavpo1\_1280.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132435/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mh6nxcq3cj1qzqavpo1_1280.jpg) | 88.82 KB |
author: manifold

comments.content: I'm probably wrong but I see Paul Renner's [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132435/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura), Demi or Bold...
@Ryuk I think you're right. Oh well, that's embarassing... I guess I could've figured that out myself... Thanks!
